issue.title: dynarray should state which container requirements aren't met

blockquote.p: "Unless otherwise specified, all dynarray operations have the same requirements and semantics as specified in ."

discussion.p:
Some differences from are not explicitly specified, including at least the lack of a default constructor, copy assignment and swap member.
The wording could be similar to which says "An array satisfies all of the requirements of a container and of a reversible container (), except that a default constructed array object is not empty and that swap does not have constant complexity."

li.p: -2- A dynarray satisfies all of the requirements of a container and of a reversible container (), except for default construction, assignment and swap. Unless otherwise specified, all dynarray operations have the same requirements and semantics as specified in .
